channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How a plumbing small business shaped a community in Denver
item.description: In 1968, Nathaniel Estes started his own plumbing business in Denver's Five Points neighborhood. As his company grew, he became a pillar of the local ...

item.title: As Republicans face voters during tense town halls, it's about sticking to the script
item.description: While just a fraction of Republicans in Congress are holding town halls during the August recess — in-person and virtual — the questions from voters, ...

item.title: In Houston, some worry their problems would be neglected after redistricting
item.description: In one neighborhood of the city, Latinos worry about immigration and urban problems but may soon be grouped in with suburban voters.

item.title: Trump and Putin meet today in Anchorage. Here's what to know

item.title: Celebrities are marketing products directly to their fans
item.description: Stars are starting their own companies and marketing products directly to their fans. We talked to people following and making these deals, including ...

item.title: Afghan whose details were in UK data breach at risk from Taliban if deported, son tells BBC
item.description: Documents seen by the BBC suggest he was part of a special forces unit who worked with the British in Afghanistan.

item.title: 'It's coming home' - the undignified row over the body of Zambia's ex-president
item.description: Edgar Lungu, who died in June, is yet to be buried - the debate over what next exposes deep divisions.

item.title: Talks on landmark plastic pollution treaty end without an agreement

item.title: 8/14: The Daily Report
item.description: Nancy Chen reports on final preparations for the Trump-Putin summit in Alaska on Friday, and what's fact versus fiction when it comes to sunscreen.

item.title: California pushes left, Texas to the right, with US House control and Trump agenda in play
item.description: A political standoff in Texas over new U.S. House maps aimed at adding five Republican seats is poised to enter a new phase.

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin on verge of becoming Atlantic season's first hurricane
item.description: Tropical Storm Erin was on the verge of becoming the Atlantic season's first hurricane early Friday.

item.title: In maps: The war-ravaged Ukrainian territories at the heart of the Trump-Putin summit
item.description: Kyiv has rejected ceding territory seized by Russia to secure a ceasefire.

item.title: What Ukraine and Russia want from the Trump-Putin meeting in Alaska
item.description: President Trump visits Alaska Friday for what the White House has called a "listening exercise" with Russia's President Vladimir Putin.

item.title: Global plastic talks collapse as countries remain deeply divided
item.description: The latest round of UN-led talks have ended in deadlock, with disputes over plastic production and recycling.

item.title: Suspected French spy arrested in alleged Mali coup plot
item.description: The French national is accused of working "on behalf of the French intelligence service" in Mali.
